official_name: Scholarship for SC, ST & OBC Students in West Bengal

introduction.short_intro: OASIS Scholarship is a financial assistance scheme by the Government of West Bengal for SC, ST, and OBC students pursuing full-time post-matric education such as Engineering (B.Tech/B.E.).
objective: Reduce financial burden on socially backward students
Promote higher education among SC, ST & OBC communities
Ensure Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT) of scholarship amount

special_rules: Must not receive any other government scholarship at the same level
OTR (One-Time Registration) on NSP Portal is mandatory before applying
OTR required only once for lifetime
If caste certificate issued before 01-08-2025, revalidation is mandatory

general_conditions: Must be a resident of West Bengal
Must belong to SC / ST / OBC category
Must be studying regular full-time course
Aadhaar must be linked with bank account (DBT)
Student must not receive any other government scholarship

engineering: Applicable for all years including 1st year (Fresh)

fresh_application.who_should_apply: Students applying for the first time
conditions: New admission in current academic year
Income & caste certificate must be valid
ST students must complete OTR before applying

renewal_application.who_should_apply: Students who received OASIS last year
conditions: Must be promoted to next year/semester
Income & category conditions must still be valid

dont: Do not apply if receiving another govt scholarship
Do not upload expired caste/income certificate

faq.q: Can I apply if I failed last year?
faq.a: No. You must be promoted to the next year.

faq.q: Is OASIS applicable for private colleges?
faq.a: Yes, if the college is recognized.

official_note: Information is subject to verification and updates by Government of West Bengal.
